additional_info:
Storeroom, Furniture, Technique, Telephone, Internet, Cable-TV, Security, Window guards, Elevator, Heating system: central, gas, electricity, Hot water: gas 
 For rent185m² living space flat, with 5 rooms in prestigious house on Vera (Fiqris Gora). Flat has two sleeping rooms, study, 2 bathrooms and comfortable porch (terrace) all equipped with technics and furniture, internet and television.It is fully renovated including central heating, high quality Spanish tiles, and stained-glass windows. Also house has 24h security and garage. Price- 2 100$.

details.address: Tbilisi, Old Tbilisi,  Vera, Shio Mgvimeli st.
